alert.note: Alert for Central and West Carbon; North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 10 at 1:47AM MDT until October 10 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A FIRE WEATHER WATCH IS IN EFFECT FOR PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL WYOMING FROM NOON TO 6PM TUESDAY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON MDT TODAY THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON FOR LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND GUSTY WINDS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 422 AND 427... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zone 422.Fire weather zone 427. * WIND...Southwest 15 to 20 MPH with gusts up to 25 MPH. * HUMIDITY...As low as 12 to 16 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Central and West Carbon; North Snowy Range Foothills
